storyPremise: You wake up in a room full of buttons.  Each button has a strange symbol on it.  You don't have any recollection of how you got there.  Just yesterday you were driving through Nevada on your way down to Roswell for the national alien convention.  All you have is a deep sense of fear that is unexplainable.  What do you do?
You start pushing buttons. A table rises out of the ground seemingly out of nowhere. It has a key and a lock on it.
As you search the room you see a wall full of buttons.  Everything else is white.  So white that you can't tell where the corners of the wall are.
